SEARCH

Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
BankAccount
public class BankAccount extends Object
The BankAccount class represents a bank account with an account number, balance, and transaction history. It provides methods to deposit, withdraw, and print a statement, and getters and setters for the balance. * @author Matt Magnaye
Since:
04/27/2023

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BankAccount()
    Constructs a BankAccount object with a balance of zero.
    BankAccount(double balance)
    Constructs a BankAccount object with the given initial balance.

  • Method Details

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double amount) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deposits the given amount into the account.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to deposit
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is negative

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double amount) throws IllegalArgumentException, InsufficientFundsException
      Withdraws the given amount from the account.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to withdraw
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is negative
      InsufficientFundsException - if there are not enough funds in the account
